text: Imnyama yula mkali kaghoghighwa, hamwe na nabii we ughutsu iyatendile pfihulo hanu he imnyama ayo. Kwa pfihulo apfo tsakawabugha awala iwekighwe chitango cha imnyama ayo, na awala iwachitamanile chinyagho chake. Imnyama ayo mkali ne nabii ayo, wose weli tsawasighwa mne tsimbu ilikwaka ghumoto wa ghamabwe gha baluti aku wang'ali waghima,
